FILE: cm344850v11.0.txt
DYAD: INDONESIA-CROATIA

PSNOTES: 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180909
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180909

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID4471 

TERRMID: MID4471 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID4471 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID4471 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4471 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID4471 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID4471 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: MID4471 from Gibler 2018, Indonesian troops stormed and seized a Croatian transport vessel. It is unclear why it was detained or when it was released. Coded not maritime because this was not connected to a maritime dispute. 

ISLMID: MID4471 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4471 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4471 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4471 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID4471 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4471 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID4471 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4471 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4471 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4471 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID4 2002-2010:

MID4471
rivalry=344850 nationa=INDONESIA nationb=CROATIA MID4471 20050823-20050826 
 revtype1a=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=USE OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE fatalpb=0
lhostb=NO MILITARIZED ACTION 

Indonesian troops stormed and seized a Croatian transport vessel. It is unclear why it was detained or when it was released. First day of dispute was on 8/23/2005 and last day of dispute was on 8/26/2005.
